snippet: Bombers and gunmen attacked policemen and a wake in Iraq among other targets, killing at least 40 people across the country on Thursday.
abstract: Bombers and gunmen attack policemen and a wake in Iraq among other targets, killing at least 40 people across the country.
lead_paragraph: Bombers and gunmen attacked policemen and a wake in Iraq among other targets, killing at least 40 people across the country on Thursday.
